message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I can come down a bit to $170. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $170 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. If you're not interested, I'll have to go with John's offer.
Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is too low for me.  I can go as low as $145, my final offer.  This is a great deal considering its value.
